name: Lagoas Park Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is perfect for any meeting in the adjacent business park.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for business

reviews.text: Very clean, excellent service, nice breakfast. Highly recommended. They also provide a voucher for free dessert at the steakhouse across the street - nice touch.
reviews.title: Great hotel with excellent value for money

reviews.text: What a win to find this hotel in Lisbon. It is new, the rooms excellent – spacious, well appointed rooms with a balcony. Modern style rather like the W Hotels. And excellent value at a €100 special rate at the time – I would have expected closer to €200. Also good to have free high speed internet access and the breakfast was included.
reviews.title: Business Hotel (Excelent)

reviews.text: Excelent Hotel with a Very good service is situated in a Business Quarter,Lagoas Park where you have the most important enterprise headquarters in Portugal. Is far from Lisbon city and not very far from oeiras beach
reviews.title: Excellent New 4 star Hotel

description: Located between Lisbon, Cascais and also Sintra, the Lagoas Park Hotel is the perfect base for people traveling on business, that also wish to enjoy themselves through the calm, natural beauty and peacefulness that the Estoril Coastline has to offer. Whether you're traveling on business or pleasure, Lagoas Park Hotel will give you the best of both worlds.
